title: Marvel vs Capcom: Infinite has an ESRB warning of Partial Nudity
body:
But it's not for any of the female characters.

It's for Haggar, Hulk and Dante. Firebrand and Jedah are borderline but would probably count towards this anyway.

Chun Li, Morrigan, Captain Marvel and Gamora are clearly in need of sexy revealing outfits! (Sexier in the case of Morrigan.)
